abstract: United States Agency for International Development suspends International Relief and Development, one of its biggest contractors, due to questions on its spending oversight; nonprofit group works in Iraq and Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: One of the United States Agency for International Development’s largest contractors, International Relief and Development, will not be awarded any new contracts over questions about its spending oversight.
snippet: One of the United States Agency for International Development’s largest contractors, International Relief and Development, will not be awarded any new contracts over questions about its spending oversight.

keywords.value: United States Agency for International Development
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: U.S. Aid Agency Suspends Group From New Contracts
headline.print_headline: U.S. Aid Agency Suspends Group From New Contracts
